title: Zalima Zohair
author: Zalima Zohair
content: I Need to pay 15 dollars for someone in VietnamBTC Is there any way to send the amount to him and pay USDT. Knowing that he does not understand crypto and told me that he has an account in Maritime Bank. If you have another method that can be used, it can be discussed.I can send first for trusted members or use escrow.

comments.author: Zalima Zohair
comments.body: Please contact via forum pm or paste your telegram handl. i will contact you.
